title: Clifford The Big Red Menace, South Dakota’s Mexican Border Crisis? 7.1.21
itunes:title: Clifford The Big Red Menace, South Dakota’s Mexican Border Crisis? 7.1.21
description:
In episode 942, Jack and Miles are joined by comedian and My Momma Told Me's host Langston Kerman to discuss another manufactured border crisis, charges coming to Trump's top executive, the democrats doing their own January 6th commission, Andrew Giuliani getting zero votes from GOP leaders, the spectator who caused the Tour De France crash, the new Clifford the Big Red Dog film, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. A GOP Megadonor Is Funding South Dakota Gov. Noem’s National Guard Deployment to Texas
  2. Florida Game Wardens Join Red State Pilgrimage To Southern Border
  3. Charges expected Thursday for Trump’s company, top executive
  4. Morning Memo: Pelosi Takes Things Into Her Own Hands
  5. Rudy Giuliani's son, Andrew, gets zero votes from GOP leaders in bid for New York governor
  6. TOUR DE FRANCE SPECTATOR FOUND, ARRESTED ... For Allegedly Causing Crash With Sign
  7. WATCH: Clifford the Big Red Dog (2021) - Official Trailer - Paramount Pictures
  8. LISTEN: Gal Costa - Pontos De Luz - 1973

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
